$MSFT has always been the operating layer for human productivity & Satya‚Äôs point is that this doesn‚Äôt disappear just because the workers become AI agents instead of people.

As agents start doing the knowledge work then Microsoft plans to treating them as users inside Office itself so charging per AI worker with security & tools baked in.

That means every agent becomes a paid seat which turns agentic AI into a new layer of enterprise consumption revenue instead of a threat to it.

üì∫ GET OUT OF THE WAY WHEN MOMENTUM FADES

I avoided losses in $TSLA, $NVDA, and $PLTR by exiting early when technical signals turned negative.

When leading tech names break below short-term support (8/21-day MAs), the right move isn‚Äôt to hope ‚Äî it‚Äôs to reduce risk and step aside until strength returns.

Now I am only holding a small $AAPL position while monitoring $ORCL, $GOOGL, and $META for possible short-term trades if they form intraday reversal setups.
